SELECT performance.pid, performance.uid, performance.pyear, performance.pmonth, performance.performance, performance.grade, performance.supv_rating, performance.self_rating, performance.adst_rating performance.bonusres FROM perfomance

SELECT workplan.dailyplan, workplan.`completion`, performance.self_rating, performance.supv_rating, performance.adst_rating, `user`.role FROM performance LEFT JOIN workplan ON workplan.wid = #{wid} LEFT JOIN `user` ON workplan.uid = `user`.uid WHERE performance.pid = #{wid}
SELECT workplan.wid, workplan.date, workplan.dailyplan, workplan.`completion` FROM workplan WHERE workplan.uid = #{uid} ORDER BY workplan.date DESC

SELECT workplan.wid, workplan.date, workplan.dailyplan, workplan.`completion` FROM workplan LEFT JOIN employee a ON a.uid = #{uid} LEFT JOIN employee b ON a.deptnum = b.deptnum WHERE b.uid = workplan.uid AND workplan.self_rating IS NOT NULL
SELECT workplan.wid, workplan.date, workplan.dailyplan, workplan.`completion` FROM workplan WHERE workplan.supv_rating IS NOT NULL AND workplan.self_rating IS NOT NULL
SELECT performance_set.bonus_set FROM performance_set WHERE performance_set.grade = #{grade}
SELECT AVG (performance.performance) performance FROM performance WHERE performance.uid = #{uid} AND performance.pmonth = #{pmonth}
